testimonials.name: Ahmed Khan
testimonials.comment: The Umrah package exceeded my expectations. The accommodations were excellent, and the guides were knowledgeable and helpful.

testimonials.name: Fatima Ali
testimonials.comment: A truly spiritual experience. Everything was well-organized, allowing me to focus on worship without worrying about logistics.

testimonials.name: Mohammed Rahman
testimonials.comment: Great service and support throughout the journey. The only minor issue was the airport transfer delay, but everything else was perfect.

tours.title: Umrah, Makkah & Medinah – 9 Days 8 Nights

makkahHighlights.title: Masjid al-Haram
makkahHighlights.description: Prayers in the holiest mosque in Islam.

makkahHighlights.title: Kaaba
makkahHighlights.description: Heart of the Islamic world, focus of every Muslim's prayer.

makkahHighlights.title: Jabal al-Noor
makkahHighlights.description: Cave of Hira – first revelation site.

makkahHighlights.title: Jabal al-Thawr
makkahHighlights.description: Site where Prophet Muhammad ﷺ hid during Hijrah.

included: Entrance fees (Cable and car and Moon Valley)
Box lunch water, banana apple and chocolate

tours.overview: Experience the spiritual journey of a lifetime with our 9-day Umrah package. This carefully crafted itinerary takes you to the holiest sites in Islam, providing ample time for worship, reflection, and exploration. Our experienced guides will ensure your journey is comfortable, educational, and spiritually fulfilling.

makkahHighlights.title: Masjid al-Haram
makkahHighlights.description: Prayers in the holiest mosque in Islam.

makkahHighlights.title: Kaaba
makkahHighlights.description: Heart of the Islamic world, focus of every Muslim's prayer.

makkahHighlights.title: Mina
makkahHighlights.description: Stay in the tent city during the days of Hajj.

makkahHighlights.description: Collecting pebbles for the stoning ritual.

tours.overview: Our premium Hajj package offers a comprehensive and comfortable experience for pilgrims. With 5-star accommodations, experienced guides, and all logistics handled, you can focus entirely on your spiritual journey. This package includes all necessary transportation, meals, and guidance through each step of the Hajj rituals.

tours.title: Islamic Heritage Tour – 7 Days - Direct Flight
tours.overview: Explore the rich Islamic heritage of Istanbul with our 7-day tour. Visit historic mosques, palaces, and museums that showcase the grandeur of Islamic civilization. Our knowledgeable guides will take you through centuries of history, art, and architecture in this magnificent city where East meets West.

tours.title: Ramadan Umrah Special – 10 Days

makkahHighlights.title: Masjid al-Haram
makkahHighlights.description: Experience Taraweeh prayers in the holiest mosque in Islam.

makkahHighlights.title: Iftar Experience
makkahHighlights.description: Break your fast in the vicinity of the Kaaba.

makkahHighlights.title: Laylatul Qadr
makkahHighlights.description: Possibility to experience the Night of Power during the last 10 days.

makkahHighlights.title: Jabal al-Noor
makkahHighlights.description: Visit the Cave of Hira where the first revelation occurred.

medinaHighlights.title: Masjid al-Nabawi
medinaHighlights.description: Experience the special atmosphere of Ramadan in the Prophet's Mosque.

medinaHighlights.title: Rawdah
medinaHighlights.description: Pray in the area known as a piece of Paradise.

medinaHighlights.title: Quba Mosque
medinaHighlights.description: Visit the first mosque built in Islam.

tours.overview: Experience the blessed month of Ramadan in the holiest cities of Islam with our special 10-day package. This unique spiritual journey allows you to perform Umrah, pray Taraweeh, and possibly experience Laylatul Qadr in Makkah. Our package includes comfortable accommodations close to the holy sites, daily Suhoor and Iftar meals, and experienced guides to enhance your spiritual experience.

tours.title: Family Umrah Package – 12 Days

makkahHighlights.title: Masjid al-Haram
makkahHighlights.description: Family-friendly guidance for Tawaf and Sa'i.

makkahHighlights.title: Kaaba
makkahHighlights.description: Special arrangements for families with children.

makkahHighlights.title: Zamzam Well
makkahHighlights.description: Learn about the history and significance with child-friendly explanations.

makkahHighlights.title: Makkah Museum
makkahHighlights.description: Educational visit suitable for all family members.

medinaHighlights.title: Masjid al-Nabawi
medinaHighlights.description: Family-friendly visit to the Prophet's Mosque.

medinaHighlights.title: Date Farms
medinaHighlights.description: Visit local date farms for a family experience.

medinaHighlights.title: Uhud Mountain
medinaHighlights.description: Educational tour about the Battle of Uhud.

tours.overview: Our Family Umrah Package is specially designed to make the spiritual journey accessible and meaningful for families with children. With family-friendly accommodations, private transportation, and guides experienced in working with children, this package ensures that every family member, regardless of age, can fully participate in and benefit from this sacred journey. Educational materials and child-friendly explanations of rituals and sites make this an enriching experience for the whole family.

tours.title: Islamic Spain Tour – 8 Days
tours.overview: Journey through the golden age of Islamic civilization in Andalusia with our 8-day tour of Islamic Spain. Visit the magnificent Alhambra in Granada, the Great Mosque of Cordoba, and the Giralda in Seville. Learn about the rich contributions of Muslim scholars, scientists, and artists who flourished in Al-Andalus. Our expert guides will bring history to life as you walk in the footsteps of figures like Ibn Rushd, Ibn Arabi, and others who shaped world history.

tours.title: Morocco Islamic Heritage – 9 Days
tours.overview: Discover the rich Islamic heritage of Morocco with our 9-day tour through the country's imperial cities. Visit the ancient University of Al Quaraouiyine in Fez, the oldest continuously operating educational institution in the world. Explore the magnificent Hassan II Mosque in Casablanca and wander through the historic medinas with their traditional crafts and architecture. Experience the unique blend of Arab, Berber, and Andalusian influences that have shaped Moroccan Islamic culture over centuries.

tours.title: Egypt Islamic Tour – 10 Days
tours.overview: Journey through Islamic Egypt with our comprehensive 10-day tour. Visit Al-Azhar Mosque and University, one of the oldest Islamic educational institutions in the world. Explore the magnificent mosques of Cairo, including the Muhammad Ali Mosque and Ibn Tulun Mosque. Discover the Islamic heritage alongside the ancient Egyptian civilization in a tour that bridges thousands of years of history. Our expert guides will provide insights into how Islam flourished in Egypt and the significant contributions of Egyptian scholars to Islamic thought and culture.
